content_descriptors.notes:
* Suggested and visible alcohol and drug consumption (in pill/capsule form).
* Rude dialogue/insulting.
* Certain situations that are, for the most part, absurd will sometimes have scenes of gratuitous violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS or Latest Steam OS
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu LTS or Latest Steam OS
  • Processor: Quad-Core Procesor and more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Where is Johnny Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-Core Procesor and more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
